title: Spellwood: Word Game Adventure v1.0.8 [PD]
description:
Become a word wizard! Spellwood is a word game adventure that makes you better at word games. Wield words in battle, mix it up with magic, and feel your powers grow.

Features:

- Solo adventure and multiplayer modes.
- New levels available for purchase inside the app 
- For Android phones and tablets.
- Play with friends with Facebook Connect.

WIELD WORDS IN BATTLE 
Duel with words in fun, quick-to-play word battles. 

MIX IT UP WITH MAGIC 
Use magic items that increase letter and word scores, change letters, restore health, and more. 

FEEL YOUR POWERS GROW 
Young or new to word games, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fun and easy to build words on the smaller board where the words disappear.

PLAY & CHAT WITH FRIENDS 
Play friends and family with Facebook Connect and Game Center. Play up to 50 games simultaneously.

CONQUER THE SOLO QUESTS 
Battle over 90 foes in the towers. Play and win all the game variations and rewards.

Developed by Three Rings, makers of Puzzle Pirates and other great games!

What's New:

- You can now challenge Google+ friends to duels!
- Trophies for completing campaigns on Word Wizard difficulty.
- Trophies for winning 10, 50, and 100 duels.
- Campaign completion screens.
- Ability to share tower and campaign completion to Facebook.
- Ability to invite non-Spellwood-playing Facebook friends to play.
- Friends now auto-refreshed when you click NEW DUEL.
- Reduced size of game by 14 megabytes!
